properties.entry: SELECT STUDY_TIME_NO, TARGET_TIME, TIME_AMOUNT, STUDY_DATE FROM STUDY_TIME WHERE USER_NO = ? ORDER BY STUDY_DATE
INSERT INTO STUDY_TIME (STUDY_TIME_NO, USER_NO, TIME_AMOUNT, STUDY_DATE) VALUES(SEQ_asdasd.NEXTVAL ,? ,? ,? )
SELECT SUM (TIME_AMOUNT) AS TIME_AMOUNT FROM STUDY_TIME WHERE USER_NO = ?
